pr_title: Handle internal kinesis sequence numbers when reporting lag

timeline.message: Handle internal kinesis sequence numbers when reporting lag

timeline.bodyHTML:
nit: use isValidAWSKinesisSequence instead

Suggested change
if (END_OF_SHARD_MARKER.equals(sequenceNumber)
|| NO_END_SEQUENCE_NUMBER.equals(sequenceNumber)
|| EXPIRED_MARKER.equals(sequenceNumber)) {
if (!isValidAWSKinesisSequence(sequenceNumber)) {
timeline.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText: I avoided that deliberately since we may have a sequence number that does not indicate max sequence but is not a valid kinesis sequence number either.
replies.author: abhishekagarwal87

timeline.body: Can we add some tests for this? I don't know if we can simulate this scenario in an integration test, but can we add a unit test for this
timeline.bodyText: Can we add some tests for this? I don't know if we can simulate this scenario in an integration test, but can we add a unit test for this
